Title: Relates to requiring skiers to wear protective helmets and requires that ski area operators make such helmets available to the public
Summary: Requires skiers to wear protective helmets and requires that ski area operators make educational literature regarding injury prevention and such helmets available to the public and require their use; provides for penalties for violations by ski area operators.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law and the labor law, in relation to the duties of skiers and ski area operators and penalties for violation thereof
